name: HengeNoJutsu Token Changer
description: Henge No Jutsu Token Changer transforms a token image between two saved states with only one command (or macro) and a little smoke effect.See it here in action:[https://imgur.com/a/tygImsB](https://imgur.com/a/tygImsB)### Usage 1. Create a rollable table with two images  2. Select the desired token 3. !hengenojutsu [rollatable name]
